author: dontbugme

comments.content:
Are we cutting off links to Dafont now? Renko’s link wouldn’t work when I tried to see the font.

- Mike Yanega
No, Mike, I don’t think we do. I guess Renko just messed up his formatting.
No we aren’t killing links for Dafont.

Sorry, Mike. Yes, I messed up my link but won’t fix it, because of the right timestamp. (Besides I am not allowed to edit in this timestage). But clicking the messedlink with the right mouseclick leads to a pulldownmenu with google and the first result is thr link to dafont so I didn’t mind. Sorry for the confusion.
